chapters.title: Knowing Our Numbers
chapters.description: Introduction to large numbers, comparing and forming numbers, and the Indian and International number systems.

chapters.title: Whole Numbers
chapters.description: Concept of whole numbers, number line, and basic properties like closure, commutativity, and associativity.

chapters.title: Playing with Numbers
chapters.description: Understanding factors, multiples, prime and composite numbers, divisibility rules, and prime factorization.

chapters.title: Basic Geometrical Ideas
chapters.description: Introduction to points, lines, line segments, rays, angles, triangles, quadrilaterals, and circles.

chapters.title: Understanding Elementary Shapes
chapters.description: Learning about different types of shapes and measuring line segments, angles, and types of triangles and quadrilaterals.
